content.raw:
New patched versions of our 4.x and 5.x gazebo series:

### Gazebo 4.1.2 ###

* ABI check is [fine](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any_to_any-abichecker-utopic-amd64/5/API_ABI_report/)

```
jrivero@nium tools $ ./bitbucket_pullrequests --summary-range gazebo_4.1,gazebo4_4.1.1
[pr 1492] Speed up World::Step in loops
[pr 1494] Reduce selection buffer updates -> 4.1
[pr 1487] Fix QT rendering, and rendering update rate
[pr 1474] Fix loading of SimbodyPhysics parameters
[pr 1455] Fix heightmap on OSX -> 4.1
[pr 1458] Remove extra pose tag in a world file that should not be there
[pr 1448] Better fix for #236 for IMU that doesn't require ABI changes
[pr 1446] Fix regression of #236 for ImuSensor in 4.1
[pr 1430] Preserve previous GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH values when sourcing setup.sh
[pr 1423] issue #857: fix segfault for simbody screw joint when setting limits due to uninitialized limitForce.
[pr 1413] Allow multiple contact sensors per link (#960)
[pr 1406] Fix for issue #351, ODE World Step
[pr 1405] Disable failing InelasticCollision/0 test (#1394)
[pr 1379] Prevent out of bounds array access in SkidSteerDrivePlugin (found by cppcheck 1.68)
```

### Gazebo 5.0.2 ###

* ABI check is [fine](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any_to_any-abichecker-utopic-amd64/8/API_ABI_report/)

```
jrivero@nium tools $ ./bitbucket_pullrequests --summary-range gazebo5,gazebo5_5.0.1
[pr 1517] Fix ffmpeg deprecation warnings by creating helper functions with ifdefs
[pr 1504] Merge unthrottled step changes to gazebo5
[pr 1501] Merge selection buffer updates from gazebo_4.1 to gazebo5
[pr 1495] Fix QT rendering in gazebo5
[pr 1482] Add Link::GetWorldAngularMomentum, enable bullet gyroscopic forces
[pr 1484] gazebo5: allow sdformat3 and fix tests
[pr 1477] Fix simple shape normals
[pr 1450] Test for #602 (segfault after Unsubscribe)
[pr 1466] Add ServerFixture::SpawnModel(msgs::Model) and use some ToSDF functions in tests
[pr 1452] Coulomb friction for BulletSliderJoint (#1348)
[pr 1474] Fix loading of SimbodyPhysics parameters
[pr 1427] Implement Coulomb joint friction for DART (#1281)
[pr 1455] Fix heightmap on OSX -> 4.1
[pr 1453] ServerFixture: replace "using namespace gazebo;" with "namespace gazebo {}"
[pr 1440] Enable tests fixed by pull request #1423
[pr 1448] Better fix for #236 for IMU that doesn't require ABI changes
[pr 1429] Add msgs::ModelToSDF, and simple shape helper functions
[pr 1446] Fix regression of #236 for ImuSensor in 4.1
[pr 1443] kill -9 rogue gzserver's (#1299)
[pr 1430] Preserve previous GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH values when sourcing setup.sh
[pr 1423] issue #857: fix segfault for simbody screw joint when setting limits due to uninitialized limitForce.
[pr 1404] Enable simbody joint tests, implement Joint::GetParam
[pr 1426] Remove duplicate compilations to speed up building gzclient
[pr 1419] Add msgs::JointToSDF and test
[pr 1399] Updated documentation
[pr 1422] Merge gazebo 4.1 to gazebo5
[pr 1412] Fix INTEGRATION_physics_msgs test failure for DART (#1409)
[pr 1415] Add msgs::VisualToSDF, MaterialToSDF, and ConvertShaderType
[pr 1410] C++11: use auto to shorten for loops with iterators
[pr 1406] Fix for issue #351, ODE World Step
[pr 1403] Backport fixes for GDAL on osx from pull request #1388 to gazebo5
```
content.html:
New patched versions of our 4.x and 5.x gazebo series:

Gazebo 4.1.2

  • ABI check is fine
jrivero@nium tools $ ./bitbucket_pullrequests --summary-range gazebo_4.1,gazebo4_4.1.1
[pr 1492] Speed up World::Step in loops
[pr 1494] Reduce selection buffer updates -> 4.1
[pr 1487] Fix QT rendering, and rendering update rate
[pr 1474] Fix loading of SimbodyPhysics parameters
[pr 1455] Fix heightmap on OSX -> 4.1
[pr 1458] Remove extra pose tag in a world file that should not be there
[pr 1448] Better fix for #236 for IMU that doesn't require ABI changes
[pr 1446] Fix regression of #236 for ImuSensor in 4.1
[pr 1430] Preserve previous GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH values when sourcing setup.sh
[pr 1423] issue #857: fix segfault for simbody screw joint when setting limits due to uninitialized limitForce.
[pr 1413] Allow multiple contact sensors per link (#960)
[pr 1406] Fix for issue #351, ODE World Step
[pr 1405] Disable failing InelasticCollision/0 test (#1394)
[pr 1379] Prevent out of bounds array access in SkidSteerDrivePlugin (found by cppcheck 1.68)

Gazebo 5.0.2

  • ABI check is fine
jrivero@nium tools $ ./bitbucket_pullrequests --summary-range gazebo5,gazebo5_5.0.1
[pr 1517] Fix ffmpeg deprecation warnings by creating helper functions with ifdefs
[pr 1504] Merge unthrottled step changes to gazebo5
[pr 1501] Merge selection buffer updates from gazebo_4.1 to gazebo5
[pr 1495] Fix QT rendering in gazebo5
[pr 1482] Add Link::GetWorldAngularMomentum, enable bullet gyroscopic forces
[pr 1484] gazebo5: allow sdformat3 and fix tests
[pr 1477] Fix simple shape normals
[pr 1450] Test for #602 (segfault after Unsubscribe)
[pr 1466] Add ServerFixture::SpawnModel(msgs::Model) and use some ToSDF functions in tests
[pr 1452] Coulomb friction for BulletSliderJoint (#1348)
[pr 1474] Fix loading of SimbodyPhysics parameters
[pr 1427] Implement Coulomb joint friction for DART (#1281)
[pr 1455] Fix heightmap on OSX -> 4.1
[pr 1453] ServerFixture: replace "using namespace gazebo;" with "namespace gazebo {}"
[pr 1440] Enable tests fixed by pull request #1423
[pr 1448] Better fix for #236 for IMU that doesn't require ABI changes
[pr 1429] Add msgs::ModelToSDF, and simple shape helper functions
[pr 1446] Fix regression of #236 for ImuSensor in 4.1
[pr 1443] kill -9 rogue gzserver's (#1299)
[pr 1430] Preserve previous GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH values when sourcing setup.sh
[pr 1423] issue #857: fix segfault for simbody screw joint when setting limits due to uninitialized limitForce.
[pr 1404] Enable simbody joint tests, implement Joint::GetParam
[pr 1426] Remove duplicate compilations to speed up building gzclient
[pr 1419] Add msgs::JointToSDF and test
[pr 1399] Updated documentation
[pr 1422] Merge gazebo 4.1 to gazebo5
[pr 1412] Fix INTEGRATION_physics_msgs test failure for DART (#1409)
[pr 1415] Add msgs::VisualToSDF, MaterialToSDF, and ConvertShaderType
[pr 1410] C++11: use auto to shorten for loops with iterators
[pr 1406] Fix for issue #351, ODE World Step
[pr 1403] Backport fixes for GDAL on osx from pull request #1388 to gazebo5
